ing Showaxe was the ruler of the dwarves who inhabited the Mountains of the Alaoreum circa 227 DR.
King Showaxe of Ironfang led his troops into an epic battle with a fearsome red dragon named Stormcrossing in the . King Showaxe emerged victorious in the clash and claimed the dragons hoard. But the price of victory was steep—Stormcrossing set the dwarven town of Deepgate‎ ablaze. A column of smoke from the pyre alerted humans from the Swordslake Creek of the previously unknown dwarven presence in the Alaoreum.
